杭.definition: surname Hang; abbr. for Hangzhou 杭州[Hang2zhou1]

杭州市.definition: Hangzhou, sub-provincial city and capital of Zhejiang Province 浙江省[Zhe4jiang1 Sheng3]

杭錦.definition: Hanggin banner, Mongolian Xanggin khoshuu, in Ordos prefecture 鄂爾多斯|鄂尔多斯[E4 er3 duo1 si1], Inner Mongolia

杭錦後旗.definition: Hanggin Rear banner or Xanggin Xoit khoshuu in Bayan Nur 巴彥淖爾|巴彦淖尔[Ba1 yan4 nao4 er3], Inner Mongolia

杭錦旗.definition: Hanggin banner, Mongolian Xanggin khoshuu, in Ordos prefecture 鄂爾多斯|鄂尔多斯[E4 er3 duo1 si1], Inner Mongolia
